verses.verse: Paul <WG3972> And <WG2532> Silvanus <WG4610> And <WG2532> Timothy, <WG5095> To The <WG3588> Assembly <WG1577> Of Thessalonians <WG2331> In <WG1722> God <WG2316> Father <WG3962> Our <WG2257> And <WG2532> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ. <WG5547>
Grace <WG5485> To You <WG5213> And <WG2532> Peace <WG1515> From <WG575> God <WG2316> Father <WG3962> Our <WG2257> And <WG2532> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ. <WG5547>

To Thank <WG2168> We Ought <WG3784> <WG3588> God <WG2316> Always <WG3842> Concerning <WG4012> You, <WG5216> Brethern, <WG80> Even As <WG2531> Meet <WG514> It Is, <WG2076> Because <WG3754> Increases Exceedingly <WG5232> <WG3588> Faith <WG4102> Your, <WG5216> And <WG2532> Abounds <WG4121> The <WG3588> Love <WG26> Of One <WG1520> Each <WG1538> Of All <WG3956> You <WG5216> To <WG1519> One Another; <WG240>

So As For <WG5620> Us <WG2248> Ourselves <WG846> In <WG1722> You <WG5213> To Boast <WG2744> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Assemblies <WG1577> <WG3588> Of God <WG2316> For <WG5228> <WG3588> <WG5281> Your Endurance <WG5216> And <WG2532> Faith <WG4102> In <WG1722> All <WG3956> <WG3588> <WG1375> Your Persecutions <WG5216> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Tribulations <WG2347> Which <WG3739> Ye Are Bearing; <WG430>

A Manifest Token <WG1730> Of The <WG3588> Righteous <WG1342> Judgment <WG2920> <WG3588> Of God, <WG2316> For <WG1519> <WG3588> To Be Accounted Worthy <WG2661> You <WG5209> Of The <WG3588> Kingdom <WG932> <WG3588> Of God, <WG2316> For <WG5228> Which <WG3739> Also <WG2532> Ye Suffer; <WG3958>
If At Least <WG1512> Righteous It Is <WG1342> With <WG3844> God <WG2316> To Recompense <WG467> To Those Who <WG3588> Oppress <WG2346> You <WG5209> Tribulation, <WG2347>

And <WG2532> To You <WG5213> That <WG3588> Are Oppressed <WG2346> Repose <WG425> ' With <WG3326> Us, <WG2257> At <WG1722> The <WG3588> Revelation <WG602> Of The <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> ' From <WG575> Heaven <WG3772> ' With The <WG3326> Angels <WG32> <WG1411> Of His Power, <WG846>

In <WG1722> A Fire <WG4442> Of Flame, <WG5395> Awarding <WG1325> Vengeance <WG1557> On Those That <WG3588> Not <WG3361> Know <WG1492> God, <WG2316> And <WG2532> Those That <WG3588> Not <WG3361> Obey <WG5219> The <WG3588> Glad Tidings <WG2098> <WG3588> <WG2962> Of Our Lord <WG2257> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547>

Who The <WG3748> Penalty <WG1349> Shall Suffer, <WG5099> Destruction <WG3639> Eternal, <WG166> From The <WG575> Presence <WG4383> Of The <WG3588> Lord, <WG2962> And <WG2532> From <WG575> The <WG3588> Glory <WG1391> <WG3588> <WG2479> Of His Strength, <WG846>

When <WG3752> He Shall Have Come <WG2064> To Be Glorified <WG1740> In <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG40> His Saints <WG846> And <WG2532> To Be Wondered At <WG2296> In <WG1722> All <WG3956> Them That <WG3588> Believe, <WG4100> Because <WG3754> Was Believed <WG4100> <WG3588> <WG3142> Our Testimony <WG2257> ' To <WG1909> You, <WG5209> In <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG2250> That Day. <WG1565>

For <WG1519> Which <WG3739> Also <WG2532> We Pray <WG4336> Always <WG3842> For <WG4012> You, <WG5216> That <WG2443> You <WG5209> May Count Worthy <WG515> Of The <WG3588> Calling <WG2821> <WG3588> <WG2316> Our God, <WG2257> And <WG2532> May Fulfil <WG4137> Every <WG3956> Good Pleasure <WG2107> Of Goodness <WG19> And <WG2532> Work <WG2041> Of Faith <WG4102> With <WG1722> Power, <WG1411>

So That <WG3704> May Be Glorified <WG1740> The <WG3588> Name <WG3686> <WG3588> <WG2962> Of Our Lord <WG2257> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> In <WG1722> You, <WG5213> And <WG2532> Ye <WG5210> In <WG1722> Him, <WG846> According To <WG2596> The <WG3588> Grace <WG5485> <WG3588> <WG2316> Of Our God <WG2257> And <WG2532> Of The Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ. <WG5547>
